overview: Female director Anjali Kara directs a collection of couple friendly vignettes that celebrate the intimacy that couples share on Valentine's Day.  Five cinematic scenes capture the fun and excitement of the giving of sexy, personal gifts and the resulting sexual encounters. Eternal Valentine is a movie for couples to watch and enjoy together. Tender, romantic sexy games are played out for your personal viewing pleasure and brought to you by The Daring Media Group.
title: Eternal Valentine
